properties.value: Hickton is the master of Fletching, and resides in a two-story building near the bank in central Catherby. Hickton also owns an archery supplies shop called Hickton's Archery Emporium. Players with level 99 in Fletching may buy a Fletching cape from Hickton. To purchase the cape, players have to access Hickton's Archery Emporium by trading him to see the cape being sold for 99,000 coins.

Hickton

NPC ID3212

Hickton is the master of Fletching, and resides in a two-story building near the bank in central Catherby. Hickton also owns an archery supplies shop called Hickton's Archery Emporium. Players with level 99 in Fletching may buy a Fletching cape from Hickton. To purchase the cape, players have to access Hickton's Archery Emporium by trading him to see the cape being sold for 99,000 coins.

Contents

  • 1 Treasure Trails
  • 2 Stock
    • 2.1 Fletching cape
    • 2.2 Fletching cape(t)
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

Hickton is the solution to the medium anagram clue: THICKNO. The answer to his challenge: How many ranges are there in Catherby? is: 2.

Fletching cape[edit | edit source]

If a player has 99 Fletching, they will have access to a duplicate version of the shop, with the only difference being the addition of the Fletching cape. The stock of this shop is not shared with the regular shop.

ItemNumber
in stock		Restock
time		Price
sold at		Price
bought at		GE
price
Fletching cape10.6s 99,000N/ANot sold

Fletching cape(t)[edit | edit source]

For players with 99 Fletching and at least one other 99, they will access a second duplicate shop. Just like the previous, the stock of this shop is not shared with the others.
